import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { GetProductById } from '../../api/products' export const SinglePostPage = ({ match }) => { const { postId } = match.params console.log(postId) const dispatch = useDispatch() dispatch(GetProductById(postId)) const posts = useSelector((state) => state.posts.posts); const renderedPosts = posts.map((post) => (

{post.user}

{post.titre}

{post.price} $






)); return (

Accueil

{renderedPosts}
); };
